description:
Vimeo is seeking a Sr. Technical Recruiter to join our People team. The Sr. Technical Recruiter will be skilled at building strong candidate and hiring manager relationships, and leveraging the power of rapport, employer brand, and market knowledge to find, engage, and hire top talent.

We are a globally distributed Recruiting team eager to welcome team members who value collaboration, inclusivity, and have a drive to constantly grow their expertise in the Recruiting space.

What you’ll do:

  • Own the full recruitment life cycle - from kicking off roles with hiring managers, to building pipelines and shepherding candidates through a standardized interview process, all the way through to extending and negotiating offers and securing hires.
  • Partner closely with hiring managers to create innovative engagement strategies alongside consistent processes that will identify and attract the right talent for Vimeo’s business needs.
  • Have a deep commitment to candidate experience and treating each applicant - whether they be a referral, sourced candidate, or inbound applicant - with equal care.
  • Demonstrate high detail orientation and an understanding of how an ATS and the way we store our data impacts reporting and ability to monitor the health of our requisitions.
  • Use a data-informed approach to advise your hiring teams, providing updates that celebrate the wins as well as quickly identify any areas where improvement or a pivot is needed.
  • Collaborate with HRBPs, Rewards, and Finance to ensure we are getting ahead of upcoming headcount and attrition while balancing being mindful of both the external market and internal peer equity.
  • Work closely with our Sr. Global Belonging & Social Enablement Director to ensure we are bringing diverse perspectives into Vimeo.
  • Generously share and absorb knowledge across the broader Recruiting Team.

Skills and knowledge you should possess:

  • 5+ years of full cycle recruiting experience, ideally in high-volume, tech-focused environments.
  • A breadth of knowledge and experience successfully recruiting for a mix of domains and seniorities, but with a particular passion for technical and/or hard to fill positions.
  • A sharp eye for resume review as well as market knowledge to help identify passive candidates on LinkedIn. You love looking for the needle in the haystack!
  • Demonstrated track record of managing both active and passive candidate funnels and driving referrals.
  • Ability to develop solid relationships and proactively engage with both candidates and hiring managers.
  • Experience training and mentoring teammates, continuously knowledge-sharing at all stages in the hiring cycle.
  • Comfort with ambiguity and ability to independently problem solve, even without existing processes in place.
  • Practiced skills in delivering offers and the art of negotiation.
  • A dedication to helping Vimeo build a diverse workforce across all functions and levels.
  • Desire to contribute to broader People Team initiatives that support our Department and company goals.

Bonus points (nice skills to have, but not needed):

  • Ideally, some prior experience in global recruitment (or an eagerness to build networks in new regions).
  • Familiarity with some of our existing systems and tools such as Greenhouse ATS, Linkedin Recruiter, Lattice, UKG, Slack, G-suite.

Targeted Base Salary Range: $100,800 to $154,000

The base salary range listed above is for candidates located in the U.S., including the New York City metro area.

At Vimeo, we strive to hire and nurture amazing talent across the globe. Actual salaries will vary depending on factors including but not limited to experience, specialized skills, internal alignment and a candidate’s home base.

Base salary is just one component of Vimeo’s total rewards philosophy. We offer a wide range of benefits and perks that appeal to the variety of needs across our diverse employee base! Other rewards may include bonus or commission, Restricted Stock Units (RSUs), paid time off, generous 401k match, wellbeing resources, and more.

About Us:

Vimeo (NASDAQ: VMEO) is the world's most innovative video experience platform. We enable anyone to create high-quality video experiences to better connect and bring ideas to life. We proudly serve our community of millions of users – from creative storytellers to globally distributed teams at the world's largest companies – whose videos receive billions of views each month. Learn more at www.vimeo.com.

Vimeo is headquartered in New York City with offices around the world. At Vimeo, we believe our impact is greatest when our workforce of passionate, dedicated people, represents our diverse and global community. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer where diversity, equity, and inclusion is championed in how we build our products, develop our leaders, and strengthen our culture.
